settings.subtitle: Our mission is
settings.title: Your mission
settings.text: We're here to help you let your light shine before others. Make more than a fashion statement—make an impact.

settings.title: Testimony(als)
settings.testimonial_1:
Crucifly helps me not only to

know the Word, but to live it.
settings.testimonial_2:
I feel God's presence in these clothes.

It's an honor to boast in Christ.

settings.subtitle: Pro Tip for
settings.title: Prayer Warriors
settings.text:
1.  Before you take on this merchandise & enter the world, ask the God of heaven's armies to be with you.

2.  If someone asks you what it's about, believe that He will give you the words to speak + the strength not to stumble.

3.  Have accountability: tell another believer you trust about your experience!

settings.subtitle: Check this out
settings.title: Proverbs 3:5-6 (ESV)
settings.text:
5 Trust in the Lord with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6 In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.

settings.title: Jesus Christ
settings.text:
Who is He?

Why is He so famous?

What does it mean to know Him?
